Class: TrainableBilateralFilterFunction, a torch.autograd.Function for a TrainableBilateralFilter layer. It implements forward and backward passes for a bilateral filter with trainable parameters sigma_x, sigma_y, sigma_z, color_sigma. Used for denoising CT images, low-parameter.

So summary: Implements custom autograd operation that applies a bilateral filter to a tensor, with learnable spatial and intensity standard deviations, enabling gradient-based optimization of filter parameters.

Business intent: Provide a differentiable bilateral filter component for deep learning models, especially for medical imaging denoising, allowing end-to-end training with few parameters.

Keywords: bilateral filter, trainable, autograd, torch, denoising, medical imaging, CT, gradient, spatial sigma, intensity sigma, low-parameter.
